entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.

text: @realDonaldTrump God, with Biblical pinpoint accuracy in timing, works in mysterious ways and sent the coronavirus to create chaos just in time to display your total incompetence and ensure you WILL NOT get a 2nd term. Let that sink in for all of your FAKE "Evangelical Christian" supporters!
